Blade Flows Like Water.name: Blade Flows Like Water
Blade Flows Like Water.flavor: As you stride forward, you deal a blow to each enemy you pass.
Blade Flows Like Water.effect: You shift 4 squares. Each time you enter a square adjacent to an enemy for the first time during the move, you can use the following attack against that enemy.
Blade Flows Like Water.onHit: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you mark the target until the end of your next turn.
Blade Flows Like Water.special: If you have not yet expended your furious assault racial power in this encounter, you also add your Strength modifier to the damage of this attack.

Enforced Peace.name: Enforced Peace
Enforced Peace.flavor: If the enemy chooses to attack your allies, the consequences are on his own head.
Enforced Peace.trigger: An enemy that you marked hits one of your allies with an attack
Enforced Peace.effect: You teleport 10 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy and make the following attack.
Enforced Peace.attack: Intelligence vs. Fortitude, Reflex, Will. You make one attack roll, comparing the result against these three defenses. The target suffers the effect associated with each defense that the attack hits.
Enforced Peace.onHit (Fortitude): The target is weakened until the end of its next turn.
Enforced Peace.onHit (Reflex): The target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Enforced Peace.onHit (Will): The target is dazed until the end of its next turn.
Enforced Peace.special: If you have not yet expended your furious assault racial power in this encounter, you also add your Strength modifier to the damage of this attack.

Ghost Lion's Step.name: Ghost Lion's Step
Ghost Lion's Step.flavor: You move through the battlefield with supreme confidence, letting nothing stop you.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: Until the end of your next turn, you do not provoke opportunity attacks from moving, you ignore difficult terrain, and you are immune to being dazed, slowed, or immobilized.
